Package io.github.samkt17

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Item
    This interface is the contract for the product class.
    MultimediaControl
    Is the basic contract for the visual devices and what they can do.
    ScreenSpec
    This is interface for the screens and there values.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayer
    This class extends Product and Implements MultimediaControl and lets us access the device.
    DatabaseHandler
    This class connects us to the database.
    Employee
    The Employee class creates employee objects to store into the database.
    Main
    This applications is a production tracker.
    MoviePlayer
    This class will be used to have access to the visual devices.
    Product
    This class creates all the products.
    ProductController
    This class is the main controller for the project and hold the logic for the GUI.
    ProductionRecord
    This class is used for creating a new production record.
    Screen
    This class creates screens for our products.
    Widget
    The widget class extends the product class and it is what we use to access the product class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ItemType
    ItemType enum is used to help us keep track of the different types of devices we have.
    MonitorType
    Basic enum for the types of monitors.
